# This file lists a few inflected forms of Bangla verbs.
# The four tab-separated columns are as follows:
#   1. Verbal noun form (citation form). E.g. আঁকা
#   2. Third person familiar form, simple present. E.g. (সে) আঁকে
#   3. Third person familiar form, present perfect. E.g. (সে) এঁকেছে
# For approximately half of the verbs listed here, column 2 appears
# identical to column 4. However, in general these two forms are not
# pronounced the same. For some verbs column 2 and column 4 can be
# homographs. Examples of such homographs include:
#   করে pronounced /k O . r e/ in column 2; but /k o . r e/ in column 4
#   দেখে pronounced /d E . kh e/ in column 2; but /d e . kh e/ in column 4
